testcase.name: Clicking the hotels logo refreshes the page but doesnt change the url
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Clicking the hotels logo refreshes the page but doesnt change the url Given We are on the homepage ... passed in 3.999s When We click the logo in the top left corner ... passed in 2.407s Then Page is refreshed and we remain on the homepage ... passed in 0.004s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Searching for a hotel room in Calgary Canada for a select number of nights
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Searching for a hotel room in Calgary Canada for a select number of nights Given We are on the homepage ... passed in 2.142s And We click the going to button ... passed in 0.059s And We type in 'Calgary' ... passed in 0.199s And We select the first option from the dropdown menu ... passed in 0.375s And We select the date filter menu ... passed in 0.133s And We select the starting date of 27 December ... passed in 0.604s And We select the checkout date of 30 December ... passed in 0.054s And We click the done button under the date filter ... passed in 0.054s When We click the travellers filter ... passed in 0.049s And We change the number of travellers to 1 ... passed in 0.596s And We click the done button under the travellers filter ... passed in 0.051s And We click the search button ... passed in 4.114s Then We are redirected to a results page with the filters entered ... passed in 0.036s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Changing the region displayed on the website
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Changing the region displayed on the website Given We are on the homepage ... passed in 2.284s When We click the english button ... passed in 0.096s And We click the region tab ... passed in 0.180s And We select Australia as our region from the dropdown menu ... passed in 0.063s And We click save ... passed in 2.875s Then We are redirected to the Australian website ... passed in 0.010s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Changing the region back to Canada
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Changing the region back to Canada Given We are on the Australian homepage ... passed in 3.197s When We click the english button ... passed in 0.146s And We click the region tab ... passed in 0.126s And We select Canada as our region from the dropdown menu ... passed in 0.058s And We click save ... passed in 2.915s Then We are redirected back to the Canadian homepage ... passed in 0.003s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
